per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + (0.5*sin(12*treb)*3.12*time)/5;
per_frame_2=wave_b = wave_b + (0.5*sin(12*bass)*3.17*time)/5;
per_frame_3=wave_g =wave_g + (0.5*sin(12*mid)*3.22*time)/5;
per_frame_4=zoom = zoom+0.01;
per_frame_5=decay=1;
per_frame_6=gamma=1+(sin(time)*0.5+0.5);
per_pixel_1=tmm=time/rad/rad/rad*x;
per_pixel_2=sx = sx + if (above(rad, 0.38), +0.01, 0);
per_pixel_3=sy = sy + if (above(rad, 0.38), +0.01, 0);
per_pixel_4=warp = warp + if (above(rad,0.56 + 0.05*sin(tmm)), +0.5*(sin(rad)), 0);
